results.deck: Aspect is a Japanese video game company, founded in March of 1991.
results.description:
Overview

Aspect are most known for the development of all the Sonic the Hedgehog games for the Sega Game Gear and the Sega Pico, except for the original Sonic, which was developed by Ancient and Tails' Skypatrol.
results.name: Aspect Co. Ltd.

game.name: Deep Duck Trouble starring Donald Duck
Legend of Illusion starring Mickey Mouse
